#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long cntt=0;
void merge(int l,int m,int r,int A[])
{
	int i=l,j=m+1,k=0,temp[100002];
	//long long int cnt=0;
	while(i<m+1 && j<r+1)
	{
		if(A[i]<=A[j])temp[k++]=A[i++];
		else if(A[i]>A[j]){temp[k++]=A[j++];cntt+=(m-i+1);}
	}
	
	while(i<m+1)
		temp[k++]=A[i++];
	
	while(j<r+1)
		temp[k++]=A[j++];
		
	for(i=0;i<=r-l;i++)
		A[i+l]=temp[i];
	//cntt+=cnt;
}

void merge_sort(int A[],int n0,int nn)
{
	if(n0<nn){
	int mid=(nn+n0)/2;
	
	merge_sort(A,n0,mid);
	merge_sort(A,mid+1,nn);
	
	merge(n0,mid,nn,A);
	}

}

 
int main() {
	int t,l;
	scanf("%d",&t);l=t;
	//long long cnt;
	while(t--)
	{
	    int n,k;bool ar[100002]={},flag=0;
	    cntt=0;
	    scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
	    int a[n];
	    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	        {scanf("%d",&a[i]);if(ar[a[i]]==1)flag=1;ar[a[i]]=1;}
	   // merge_cnt(a,0,n-1);//printf("%lld ",cntt);
	    merge_sort(a,0,n-1);
	    
	    if(k<=cntt)cntt=cntt-k;
	    else {cntt=((k-cntt)%2);
	    if(flag==1)cntt=0;}
	    printf("Case %d: %lld\n",l-t,cntt);
	}
	return 0;
}
